category1.name: Full Package
category1.description: You might as well adopt a cat if you choose this option.

category1.name: One Day
category1.description: Spend a day with one of our cuddly cats. Food not provided.

category1.name: One Week
category1.description: A week of cat curiosity. Food not provided.

category1.name: Overnight Package
category1.description: Be able to sleep and cuddle with your cat companion. Added to any of the base options. If none are selected, this will be for only one night.

category1.name: Food Package
category1.description: We will provide necessary food for the cat.

category1.name: Toy Package
category1.description: We will provide a handful of toys for you to play your cat friend. You will be able to keep the toys for an added price.

category1.name: Clothing Package
category1.description: We will provide a few sets of clothing that the cat is comfortable with. Not all pets will be able to receive this.

category2.name: Full Package
category2.description: You could spend your money to get a ferret forever instead.

category2.name: One Day
category2.description: Spend over five hours with a friendly ferret! Food not provided.

category2.name: One Week
category2.description: Five days with a furry friend. Food not provided.

category2.name: Overnight Package
category2.description: Fluffy bedtime antics with your ferret pal. Added to any of the base options. If none are selected, this will be for only one night.

category2.name: Food Package
category2.description: We will provide necessary food for the ferret.

category2.name: Toy Package
category2.description: We will provide a handful of toys for you to play your ferret friend. You will be able to keep the toys for an added price.

category2.name: Clothing Package
category2.description: We will provide a few sets of clothing that your ferret will love. Not all pets will be able to receive this.

category3.name: Full Package
category3.description: Have a heavenly experience with all the hamsters.

category3.name: One Day
category3.description: Have a full day of happiness with a hamster. Food not provided.

category3.name: One Week
category3.description: Hours of hamster fun. Food not provided.

category3.name: Overnight Package
category3.description: Have fun overnight with a hamster! Added to any of the base options. If none are selected, this will be for only one night.

category3.name: Food Package
category3.description: We will provide necessary food for the hamster.

category3.name: Toy Package
category3.description: We will provide a handful of toys for the hamster. You will be able to keep the toys for an added price.

category3.name: Clothing Package
category3.description: We will provide a few sets of clothing that the hamster is comfortable with. Not all pets will be able to receive this.
